this_title: The last passenger: A true story
introduction: An old hotel in the tourist town of Mar del Sud, Argentina, is at the center of legends told and retold by the media and repeated by the guided tour that is organized by its owner, Eduardo Gamba. But when contradicting accounts surface about the legitimacy of the hotel's title deed, Gamba turns out to be a skilled storyteller and a clever interpreter of the truth.
chinese_title: The last passenger: A true story
